## Description {#details}

Specialization of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle">SeedBundle</a> for memory access instructions.

Keeps seeds sorted in ascending memory order, which is convenient for slicing these bundles into vectorizable groups.

Definition at line 135 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/seedcollector-h">SeedCollector.h</a>.
